name: Stainless Steel 12 Inch Metal Ruler with Cork Backing - Non Slip Straight Edge Ruler with Inch and Centimeters for Students
short_description: DURABLE AND VERSATILE SET: This stainless steel metal ruler includes one 12-inch (30 cm) ruler, making it perfect for a variety of measuring tasks. The sturdy construction ensures long-lasting use and suitability for various applications.

SLIP-RESISTANT CORK BACKING: The cork backing on these metal rulers ensures stability during use and prevents ink from entering under the ruler. This slip-resistant design provides accurate measurements while protecting your work surface.

ACCURATE INCH AND METRIC MEASUREMENTS: These metal ruler cork backed feature precise inch and metric measurements that are easy to read and provide clear visibility for accurate measuring. The etched markings are filled with paint for added durability and clarity.

SMOOTH EDGES AND HANGING HOLES: The smooth end sides of the stainless steel cork back rulers prevent burrs and scratches on your hands. The rulers also come with holes for easy hanging and convenient storage, making them perfect for students, teachers, and professionals alike.

WIDE RANGE OF APPLICATIONS: These stainless steel metal rulers are suitable for a wide range of applications, including home, school, drafting tools, wood measurement, and more. With their non-bendable quality, they are perfect for artists, architects, designers, engineers, carpenters, DIY enthusiasts, and anyone who needs precise measurements.
